    • Constructor Detail

      • UIButton

        public UIButton()
        Default button constructor

      • UIButton

        public UIButton(double x,
                double y,
                double width,
                double height,
                java.awt.Image upTex,
                java.awt.Image downTex)
        Button constructor
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the button
        y - the y coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button
        upTex - the texture when the mouse isn't over the button
        downTex - the texture when the mouse is over the button

      • UIButton

        public UIButton(double x,
                double y,
                double width,
                double height,
                java.lang.String text)
        Button constructor
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the button
        y - the y coordinate of the button
        width - the width of the button
        height - the height of the button
        text - the text to be rendered on top of the button

    • Method Detail

      • ifClicked

        public boolean ifClicked()
        Check if the mouse has clicked the button
        Returns:
        True if the button was clicked, false if not

        The buttons process function, called each tick of the main game loop
